oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: So Many Ways Of Saying She's Gone - Bill Eldridge performance - 1969-09-11
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance of So Many Ways Of Saying She's Gone, written by Bill Eldridge, Walter Haynes, and Gary Stewart, produced by Walter Haynes, recorded on September 11, 1969 at Bradley's Barn in Mount Juliet, Tenn., and performed by Bill Eldridge [unconfirmed]. Recording is most likely a demo performance.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Bill Eldridge
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) Bill Eldridge performs "So Many Ways Of Saying She's Gone"
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Eldridge, Bill; Haynes, Walter; Stewart, Gary; Bradley Studios
